name: Platformer Quest
description:
This is my first Platformer Game.
Hope you like it.
Please help me by donating me Here.

You can download the PC version of this game Here for best graphics and game-play experience .

Instructions :

Your goal is to collect  gems from every level by surviving
various traps and challenges.

Controls :

Left & Right Arrow to move player

Down Arrow for duck

Up Arrow for climbing ladder

and Space for jump

Thanks for your time.
